exchangeRates.note: All EUR prices converted at ‚Ç¨1 = $1.09 USD

diyLineItems.description: Premium boutique beachside hotel, 7 nights (La Moresca-level, 4-star)
diyLineItems.methodology: La Moresca is a documented 4-star boutique with Art Nouveau/Baroque design ‚Äî 'chicest place to stay in Marina di Ragusa.' Base rate ‚Ç¨189/night, August peak surcharge ~16%. Used ‚Ç¨220/night √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨1,540 ‚âà $1,678 USD. This matches the quality level SALTY books.

diyLineItems.description: Full hotel/caf√© breakfast (pastry, eggs, juice, coffee), 7 days

diyLineItems.description: Multi-course lunch at Zuma Beach Club or equivalent (antipasto + primo/secondo + drink), 7 days
diyLineItems.methodology: Beach club lunch in August: antipasto ‚Ç¨8-12 + primo/secondo ‚Ç¨12-18 + beverage ‚Ç¨3-5 = ‚Ç¨35-45/person. Used ‚Ç¨40/day √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨280 ‚âà $305 USD. No group discount as solo diner.

diyLineItems.description: Multi-course dinner at quality trattoria (antipasto + main + wine), 5 nights (SALTY-covered group dinners)
diyLineItems.methodology: Quality trattoria: antipasto ‚Ç¨8-15 + primo/secondo ‚Ç¨10-20 + wine ‚Ç¨5-10 = ‚Ç¨30-45. Used ‚Ç¨38/dinner √ó 5 SALTY-covered dinners = ‚Ç¨190 ‚âà $207 USD. Seafood-heavy Ragusa area justifies upper-mid pricing.

diyLineItems.description: Daily private instruction, 7 days (no public studios in rural Ragusa)
diyLineItems.methodology: Rural southeastern Sicily has NO documented daily group yoga studios. Floripa offers private instruction; rates not published. Private yoga/fitness instruction in Italy: ‚Ç¨40-80/session. Used ‚Ç¨60/session √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨420 ‚âà $458 USD. LOW AVAILABILITY ‚Äî this is a genuine pain point for DIY travelers.

diyLineItems.description: Daily sunbed + umbrella at quality lido, 7 days (August peak pricing)
diyLineItems.methodology: Documented Zuma pricing: ‚Ç¨18-25/day for sunbed + umbrella. August peak. Used ‚Ç¨22/day √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨154 ‚âà $168 USD. Solo traveler pays full retail ‚Äî no group rate.

diyLineItems.description: Quality touring bicycle, 7 days
diyLineItems.methodology: Trekking bike rentals: ‚Ç¨20-25/day, minimal weekly discount for solo. Used ‚Ç¨21.50/day √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨150 ‚âà $164 USD.

diyLineItems.description: 2 major guided day trips covering Noto, Modica, Syracuse (UNESCO baroque towns)
diyLineItems.methodology: SALTY includes 'vehicle for excursions' = organized/guided. Private guided Val di Noto tour (Ragusa, Modica, Noto): ‚Ç¨963 for up to 7 people. Shared small-group: ‚Ç¨80-120/person/day. Used ‚Ç¨200/day √ó 2 major day trips = ‚Ç¨400 ‚âà $436 USD. Includes guide fees and entry.

diyLineItems.description: Mid-range car, 7 days + fuel (~450km). Essential in rural Sicily ‚Äî no viable public transit.
diyLineItems.methodology: August peak: ‚Ç¨35-50/day for mid-range car. Used ‚Ç¨35/day √ó 7 = ‚Ç¨245 + ‚Ç¨45 fuel (30L √ó ‚Ç¨1.55/L for ~450km) = ‚Ç¨290 ‚âà $320 USD.

diyLineItems.description: 2 curated cocktail bar nights (premium cocktails + appetizers)
diyLineItems.methodology: Premium cocktails ‚Ç¨12-18/drink at Officina31, Prima Classe. Per evening: 2 cocktails (‚Ç¨30) + appetizers (‚Ç¨12-15) = ‚Ç¨42-45/person. Used ‚Ç¨45 √ó 2 evenings = ‚Ç¨90 ‚âà $98 USD.

diyLineItems.methodology: Private transfer (1-4 people): ‚Ç¨160 per vehicle. Solo traveler pays full rate. ‚Ç¨160 ‚âà $174 USD. Note: Return transfer would add another ‚Ç¨160 ‚Äî SALTY covers both directions.

comparisonNotes: MODERATE-WEAK COMPARISON. Morocco's low cost of living keeps DIY affordable even at premium accommodation levels. The $182 savings (8%) is thin ‚Äî largely driven by accommodation ($1,190) and surf instruction ($327). The comparison improves significantly against SALTY's shared ($2,149) and double ($2,399) tiers. Value prop should emphasize coaching quality, curated excursions, and community over cost savings. Note: SALTY's dorm tier ($1,999) is only $182 less than DIY, but the double tier ($2,399) shows $218 MORE value.

comparisonNotes: WEAK COMPARISON against dorm tier ($1,999). Sri Lanka is genuinely affordable ‚Äî even premium boutique accommodation and multi-course meals are cheap by Western standards. The 4% savings is thin. However, comparison strengthens significantly against higher tiers: triple ($2,249) saves $165, cozy double ($2,599) saves $515. The strongest SALTY value prop here is multi-location logistics ‚Äî 3 private transfers ($295) that solo travelers must arrange themselves, plus the complexity of coordinating coast + mountains itinerary. Recommend framing around 'hassle-free multi-location' and showing comparison against triple/double tiers.

comparisonNotes: STRONGEST COMPARISON. Osa Peninsula is remote and premium ‚Äî eco-lodge accommodation alone ($2,800) exceeds SALTY's entire price ($1,949). Multi-course meals at $105/day, impossible-to-access yoga/fitness ($400 for private instruction because no studios exist), and expensive ground transport all compound. SALTY's group buying power is most visible here: splitting a premium eco-lodge 4 ways plus negotiated rates cuts the biggest cost driver dramatically. This should be the LEAD comparison on the tool.

savingsDirection: SALTY saves you $566 vs. doing it yourself

pricelessItems.description: 25-30 fun-loving humans who become your crew
Every detail handled ‚Äî you just show up
Coaches with Olympic and Cirque du Soleil credentials
Content you'd normally need to book a shoot for (estimated value: $300-500)

comparisonNotes: MODERATE COMPARISON. The $566 savings (23%) is driven primarily by accommodation ‚Äî solo traveler pays $1,610 for a resort that still doesn't match SALTY's luxury villa with 4 private pools. The private chef meals are the other major differentiator: SALTY provides rotating local chefs preparing multi-course meals that restaurant dining ($348) can't replicate in quality. El Salvador's low cost of living keeps food/activity costs low, but the accommodation gap and premium experiences (private pools, chef meals, professional photography) make SALTY's value clear. Including professional photography (~$450 value) would push DIY to ~$2,965 and savings to 52%.
